## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G30240](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G30240)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>NISP</u>
- **Gene Name:** NSP-interacting syntaxin domain-containing protein
- **Description:**   Syntaxin/t-SNARE family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
